channel.title: Is this true?
channel.description:
Java download is located at:
http://java.com/en/download/windows_xpi.jsp
The most uptodate files are located at:
Server: http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/20051104-server.rar
Client: http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/rsprivservclient.rar
Item IDs for spawning items:
Items ID: http://kulma.ath.cx/rs/items
Yes, it’s now possible thanks to a guy named daiki, The Server is build off a sandbox calledBlackscape, The server is coded in Java, And is just Beginning it’s development Stage.It’s currently Lacking Features; But it’s a start!The min computer specs:- any proccessor, 333Mhz- atleast 50MB of diskspace- 150MB of ram- Java and a brainJava download is located at: The most uptodate files are located at:Server: Client: Item IDs for spawning items:Items ID:How do I install it?1] Install Java, Once you installed Java
1] Install Java, Once you installed Java2] Download the server
3] Extract it to a Folder
4] run Compile.bat let the server compile, you shouldn’t get any errors, If you do, Your javac.exe probably isn’t installed if so read the next step if not, skip the next step
OPTIONAL
5] Move the server files to your java folder in C:\Program Files\Java\; go to the BIN folder, put the files in that folder, run compile.bat AGAIN and it should work move the files back to the folder, click on run.bat and yor done!
Client
6] extract the client into another folder
7] run rsprivservclient.exe let it load, put in any username in the username slot
8] put 127.0.0.1 or localhost into the Server slot, click login
And your done!
CongratZ You have made your first Runescape Server.
Commands for Gamemasters
::kick playername (kicks player from server. Only for level 3 admins) ::item itemID (spawns item on ground) ::pickup itemID amount (spawns an X amount of item to backpack. itemID must be 4 digits. for example coins are 0955) ::empty (clears items from your backpack) ::mypos (tells your location) ::tele xxxx,yyyy (teleports you to xxxx,yyyy cordinates. Both must be 4 digits) ::nick newnick (changes your name to newnick ::players (tells you the number of players. Fixed this on version 20051104 and later) ::bank (opens your bank. anywhere, anytime) ::pass newpassword ::mod modlevel (Changes your modlevel. 0=normal player, 1=player mod, 2=golden crown -mod) ::yell some text here (Send a message shown for everyone on the server)
This link will answer any questions you have while setting it up. There have a forum here just for that. http://www.theasseffect.com/make-your-own-runescape-server/
its scary to me becuse its .BAT and .BAT can kill your computer fast (very fast)

item.title: Is this true?
item.dc:creator: @dreygoth dreygoth
item.description:
@dreygoth wrote:

Java download is located at:

http://java.com/en/download/windows_xpi.jsp

The most uptodate files are located at:

Server: http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/20051104-server.rar

Client: http://mmorpg.ragezone.com/Runescape/rsprivservclient.rar

Item IDs for spawning items:

Items ID: http://kulma.ath.cx/rs/items

Yes, it’s now possible thanks to a guy named daiki, The Server is build off a sandbox calledBlackscape, The server is coded in Java, And is just Beginning it’s development Stage.It’s currently Lacking Features; But it’s a start!The min computer specs:- any proccessor, 333Mhz- atleast 50MB of diskspace- 150MB of ram- Java and a brainJava download is located at: The most uptodate files are located at:Server: Client: Item IDs for spawning items:Items ID:How do I install it?1] Install Java, Once you installed Java

1] Install Java, Once you installed Java2] Download the server

3] Extract it to a Folder

4] run Compile.bat let the server compile, you shouldn’t get any errors, If you do, Your javac.exe probably isn’t installed if so read the next step if not, skip the next step

OPTIONAL

5] Move the server files to your java folder in C:\Program Files\Java; go to the BIN folder, put the files in that folder, run compile.bat AGAIN and it should work
move the files back to the folder, click on run.bat and yor done!

Client

6] extract the client into another folder

7] run rsprivservclient.exe let it load, put in any username in the username slot

8] put 127.0.0.1 or localhost into the Server slot, click login

And your done!

CongratZ You have made your first Runescape Server.

Commands for Gamemasters

::kick playername (kicks player from server. Only for level 3 admins)
::item itemID (spawns item on ground)
::pickup itemID amount (spawns an X amount of item to backpack. itemID must be 4 digits. for example coins are 0955)
::empty (clears items from your backpack)
::mypos (tells your location)
::tele xxxx,yyyy (teleports you to xxxx,yyyy cordinates. Both must be 4 digits)
::nick newnick (changes your name to newnick
::players (tells you the number of players. Fixed this on version 20051104 and later)
::bank (opens your bank. anywhere, anytime)
::pass newpassword
::mod modlevel (Changes your modlevel. 0=normal player, 1=player mod, 2=golden crown -mod)
::yell some text here (Send a message shown for everyone on the server)

This link will answer any questions you have while setting it up. There have a forum here just for that.
http://www.theasseffect.com/make-your-own-runescape-server/

its scary to me becuse its .BAT and .BAT can kill your computer fast (very fast)
